meaningMnemonic: While riding your <radical>scooter</radical>, you take your <radical>sword</radical> and cut out an <kanji>area</kanji> on the ground.  You carefully cut all the <kanji>side</kanji>s as you go. This area's all yours now!
readingMnemonic: As you look down at your <kanji>area</kanji> with its sword-carved <kanji>side</kanji>s, you suddenly realize there is a <reading>hen</reading> (へん) pecking at the ground in there. "Um, excuse me, hen, I believe I said this is MY area?!" You try to kick it out, but it hops over your leg.
